item.title: FASTA Parser Implemented in Rust with Nom
item.description: 1 Parsing a single FASTA Record 1.1 Representing the Record in Rust 1.2 Parsing the Title Nom makes it possible to 1 Parsing a single FASTA Record An example of FASTA record is shown below. >gi|2765658|emb|Z78533.1|CIZ78533 C.irapeanum 5.8S rRNA gene and ITS1 and ITS2 DNA CGTAACAAGGTTTCCGTAGGTGAACCTGCGGAAGGATCATTGATGAGACCGTGGAATAAACGATCGAGTG AATCCGGAGGACCGGTGTACTCAGCTCACCGGGGGCATTGCTCCCGTGGTGACCCTGATTTGTTGTTGGG CCGCCTCGGGAGCGTCCATGGCGGGTT >(another FASTA record) Each record starts with a > character, which is followed by the title on the same line. The title can be further divided into an ID and description, which is separated by a space character.
